name: Lizard Girl

They pick their mates through combat, and upon defeat the person who beat them becomes their mate... at least that's how it used to be. The breed that are found on Bamboo Road still stick these traditions, however, are less aggressive than those in other places. Do not enrage this breed though or regret it.
